titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2436) to amend title 18, United States Code, and the Uniform Code of Military Justice to protect unborn children from assault and murder, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-348, by Mrs. Myrick.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2436 with 2 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Makes in order the Committee on the Judiciary amendment in the nature of a substitute now printed in the bill. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order. Makes in order only those amendments printed in H.Rept. 106-348.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 121.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 313.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/29/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 2436 (protection of unborn children from assault and murder).
